events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to sizing issues, assigning case to Refund cluster.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle this refund case for the customer.
Hello! I'm Anna from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the info. We will start your refund process immediately once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the return label shortly.
Great, thank you for your quick response. I appreciate your help with this refund.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent back the jacket and to see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday via the provided return label. Looking forward to the refund.
Your refund has been successfully processed and should appear on your payment method shortly. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
Your refund case is now closed. Please contact us if you need any further assistance in the future.
